header.h2: Green Woods Will Be Closed Through the End of the School Year

div.span: Creating Active Young Stewards of the Natural World

div.div: To provide children in grades K through 8 with the opportunity to be active, knowledgeable, and conscientious young investigators by fostering a keen understanding of the interrelatedness and interdependence of our local and global existence; creating active young stewards of the natural world.
